articles.content: This is the sort of tiresome second-hand opinion about TV that smacks of ignorance and snobbery. As one of the elder statesmen of British mirth-making, Atkinson should know better. Sadly, hes fallen … [+1340 chars]

articles.author: Roisin O'Connor
articles.title: Tanya Roberts: James Bond star’s cause of death revealed - The Independent
articles.description: Actor collapsed while walking her dogs near her home in the Hollywood Hills
articles.content:
Tanya Roberts cause of death has been revealed by her publicist, shortly after it was confirmed that she had died following a premature announcement.
